properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND PLAN_PRIVATE = 'Y' AND PLAN_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND PLAN_SDATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PLAN_EDATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PLAN_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT PLAN_NO , PLAN_TITLE , USER_NICK , PLAN_SDATE , PLAN_EDATE FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION P JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND PLAN_PRIVATE = 'Y' AND PLAN_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND PLAN_SDATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PLAN_EDATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PLAN_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
